venue.name: Rabb Auditorium at Boston Public Library in Copley Square

item.description:
I have changed our meetup to the week after next due to Halloween and the pending world series...Go Red Sox! So make sure to mark your calendars!!

Come and network with us at the library, we will meet on the right side of the lobby by the bench then move to a table on the first floor. We'll spend some time learning about eachother and what everyone has to offer! Topics of discussion will include elevator speeches, catch phrases, and networking strategies. Meghan will be giving her short presentation on how you can have a new personalized shopping experience, something that will definatley help you and people you know with the holidays coming soon. Come learn more on Tuesday and feel free to invite a friend!

group.name: The Boston Green Business Networking Group

item.name: Networking Nite
